About Me

I am a motivated and hardworking software engineer. I am currently very interested in gaining experience in backend development in industry. My goal is to become a talented full stack engineer. To do this, I am actively developing and improving my skills in the areas of UI design, web development, backend architecture/development, databases, networks and security, and quality assurance and testing through my coursework as well as side projects that are sourced on GitHub.
